subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: When the 39 living U.S. Open champions parade around the court on Monday night, they will be celebrating 40 years since tennis broke down the barriers between amateur and professional players.
snippet: When the 39 living U.S. Open champions parade around the court on Monday night, they will be celebrating 40 years since tennis broke down the barriers between amateur and professional players.
